title: Owl
intro:
Owl is a reversing radar. It's a school project revolving around disability, specifically cerebro-injuries.

For this project, I worked with two designers: (Baptiste SINHSATTANAK) and (Clarisse GRÃ‰LY) we had to build an object or a game to help people with disabilities to socialize or to make their everyday life easier. After a few interviews with people from an association, we noticed that for those in electric wheelchairs, it was often difficult to make half-turns or to go backward without running into an obstacle, mainly because they couldn't turn their heads.

title: Monsieur Bouillon
intro: Monsieur Bouillon website was created for the Chevrier Group, a group of restaurants owned by Swiss chef Philippe Chevrier. The site includes weekly menus and the restaurant's various menus. There's also a page for reserving a table directly online.

title: Patio Restaurant
intro: Like Monsieur Bouillon, the Patio Restaurant website features one of chef Philippe Chevrier's establishments. The site also features the restaurant's menu, as well as a page allowing you to book a private room.

title: Portraits
intro: On this page, you'll find a number of different portraits, all of which are experiments in which the aim was to find a specific aesthetic for each series of photos. However, we can see that most of the aesthetics give off, more or less, the same atmosphere. This is mainly due to the search for a very cinematic aesthetic.

title: Avalanches photoshoot
intro: The photos below were taken for Annecy's football team: Les Avalanches. All are from games in the 2022/2023 season. I also had the opportunity to work on a website for the same team.

title: L'Amour
intro: L'Amour is an album by Disiz released in 2022. The aim here was to produce photos that could be used for commercial purposes (e.g. promotion for networks) without retouching after the shot. To give the image a very orange feel, I played a lot with light, especially white balance.
